spiritsExplanation:
The workout primarily embodies the "Flow & Rhythm" spirit, indicated by terms such as "dynamic yoga flow" and "morning flow" in the title and description. This suggests a smooth, continuous pattern of movement, aligning with the mind-body connection aspect typical of this spirit. The inclusion of "energy, strength & flexibility" supports the dynamic flow connotation, fitting a score of 0.8 for Flow & Rhythm.

The second spirit, "Soothing & Restorative," is identified due to the description mentioning a full-body stretch to enhance recovery and balance, which are key elements of restorative practices. The description's emphasis on starting the day and recovery suggests a gentler, restorative approach, justifying a score of 0.7 for this spirit. 

"High-Energy & Intense" is excluded as the focus isn't on maximum effort but rather on a balanced, energizing start to the day. Tags like "yoga for beginners" and user comments further imply a more accessible and flowing style rather than high intensity.
